about_the_game:
hello!

my name is ralf. right now im working somewhere outside from my hometown to earn some money.
because i didnt and still dont have anything else to do after work, i started to develop this game just for fun respective as a pastime using the most sh... eh slowest laptop ive ever seen. for me it was really nice to listen to electronic music while coding so i think everything goes fine.

anyway:
the goal of this game is to run, jump and fly through a world. i dont want it to be a realistic simulation or something like that. its not that its impossible to realize, but i think that its much more fun like that.

since this is an early access game, theres not much to see right now. you can walk through an empty world with a circle, which can be very relaxing by the way, and watch a (badly implemented) sun rising and setting. thats what you will get for your money right now. since i dont have anything else to do, i will continue developing this game respective this empty world wont last forever.

hello!

my name is ralf. right now im working somewhere outside from my hometown to earn some money.
because i didnt and still dont have anything else to do after work, i started to develop this game just for fun respective as a pastime using the most sh... eh slowest laptop ive ever seen. for me it was really nice to listen to electronic music while coding so i think everything goes fine.

anyway:
the goal of this game is to run, jump and fly through a world. i dont want it to be a realistic simulation or something like that. its not that its impossible to realize, but i think that its much more fun like that.

since this is an early access game, theres not much to see right now. you can walk through an empty world with a circle, which can be very relaxing by the way, and watch a (badly implemented) sun rising and setting. thats what you will get for your money right now. since i dont have anything else to do, i will continue developing this game respective this empty world wont last forever.
name: Crazy World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD
